TopicTitle: 1 if by land, 2 if by sea!?

Articles.Content:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NoThEnj0Q54

Youtube comments and the internet are failing. Did anyone during this time see any lanterns hanging in boston or florida mysteriously?!

Did any british sailors say anything about an odd smell of tea in the air. I'm sure combined with whatever odd odors might make up the florida waters! >< (Gator tea is good for you and me. 8)

Edited September 16, 2018 by Arugela
Well, considering some of them got tazed by local police, I'd say the reactions were mixed.

34 minutes ago, Gargamel said:

Well, considering some of them got tazed by local police, I'd say the reactions were mixed. 

Somewhat a similar story happened in the city of Brest : some sailors from a Royal Navy vessel met with others from the Armada Argentina in the town... leaving a good pile of broken windows behind them.

It was in 83, and fools from the port administration found a way to accept these two ships at the same time, omitting what happened months earlier.

Some sailors have legs of different length.
They have them standing on the slanted parts of the deck.
